rukus.text: Hontoni ware wa jinrui o, doro de katachidzukutte todo kara tsukutta
Mata ware wa sakini moesakaru hono kara kasoke Tadashi 〔Jin〕 o tsukutta
Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni mukatte ose rareta toki o omoe. `Hontoni ware wa ningen o doro de katachidzukutte, todo kara tsukurou to suru nodearu
Ware wa kare o (kanzen ni) katachidzukutta. Sorekara ware no rei o kare ni fukikomi nda toki, anata gata (tenshi) wa kare ni sajida shi nasai.' To (meijita)
Sore de tenshi-tachi wa, iburisu o nozoki issei ni sajida shita
Kare wa issho ni sajida suru koto o kyohi shita
Kare wa ose rareta. `Iburisu yo, anata ga issho ni sajida shinakatta no wa nazeka
Kare wa moshiageta. `Watashi ni wa anata ga doro de katachidzukuri, todo kara o tsukuri ni natta ningen ni sajida suru yona koto wa, dekimasen
Kare wa ose rareta. `Sorenara anata wa koko kara sagare. Hontoni anata wa, norowa rete iru
Kono noroi wa, hontoni shinpan no hi made anata no ue ni arou
Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yomigae sa reru hi made, watashi o yuyo shite kudasai
Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata wa yuyo sa reru
Kare wa moshiageta. `Omo yo anata wa, watashi o mayowa sa remashitanode, watashi wa chijo de kare-ra ni (mayoi o) konomashiku omowa se, kanarazu kare-ra subete o, mayoi ni ochira semashi yo
Kare-ra no naka de seijitsuna (onkei ni yori kiyome rareta) anata no shimo be no soto wa
Kare wa ose rareta. `Kono (kenkyode seijun'na waga shimo be no) michi koso, ware e no tadashi michidearu
Anata (iburisu) ni shitagatte, jado ni soreru yona mono o nozoki, ware no shimo be (shinja) ni kanshite wa, anata wa kare-ra no ue ni nani no ken'i o motanai
Hontoni jigoku koso, kare-ra subete no mono ni yakusoku sa reru bashodearu
Soreni wa 7tsu no mon ga ari, onono no mon ni wa, kare-ra (tsumibito) no ichidan ga wariate rareru nodearu
